about.title: About me
about.p1: Hey there, my name is Lisandro Funes.
about.p2: I'm a developer and university student of engineering in information systems.
about.p3: I enjoy writing code to create new projects and provide solutions. I like to improve myself to continue growing and incorporating new skills.
about.p4: My interest in development began when I was surfing the Internet and I found it interesting to be able to change the appearance of a web page, such as color, text and images. So, I looked into how this was possible and started modifying the pages through the development tools included in web browsers.
about.p5: Then I started studying information systems engineering, where I learned development languages like Java and Python and started developing software applications, at the same time, I learned to create solutions in a more optimal way following development patterns. I also learned about network and communications technologies, databases, operating systems, and computer architecture.
about.p6: Day by day I keep learning about Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, BootStrap, SpringBoot and Angular to apply in new projects.

card_0.description: Web page developed for a technical service, dedicated to the repair and maintenance of computers.

card_1.description: Calculator to perform basic operations, with the possibility of switching between light mode and dark mode.

card_2.description: Application that allows you to generate and scan qr codes, with the option to download and share the generated codes.
